framework.rationale: Full-stack React framework with SSR/SSG, built-in optimization, excellent developer experience
restrictions: No plain JavaScript for new development

stateManagement.preferred: React hooks for simple state, Zustand for moderate complexity

componentPatterns.props: Use TypeScript interfaces for all props
componentPatterns.children: Proper children prop typing and usage
componentPatterns.forwardRef: Use forwardRef for component library components

requirements: All functions must have explicit return types
Interface definitions for all data structures
Proper typing for React components and props
Strong typing for ShadCN component props

renderingStrategy.preferred: SSG with ISR for dynamic content
renderingStrategy.rationale: Better SEO, faster initial load, optimal for content sharing

routing.rationale: Latest Next.js routing with layouts, loading states, and React Server Components

dataFetching.serverComponents: Use React Server Components for data fetching when possible
dataFetching.clientComponents: Use SWR or React Query for client-side data fetching
dataFetching.errorHandling: Implement proper error boundaries and loading states
